experiences.title: Software Development Engineer
experiences.description: Refined data processing in model build and analysis pipeline, transforming raw data into inferred values with comprehensive automated unit and integration testing. Optimized system scalability through time complexity improvements, enhancing overall performance. Troubleshot and resolved model build pipeline failures in staging and production environments using CloudWatch logs. Streamlined and automated DevOps processes by restructuring CI/CD workflows with GitHub Actions. Implementing data export/import functionality for timeseries data purge and restore, improving database efficiency and data lifecycle management.
reference_context: Software Development Engineer at National Renewable Energy Laboratory (NREL)
Involved in refining data processing, optimizing system scalability, resolving pipeline failures, and enhancing DevOps processes
experiences.reasoning: The responsibilities involved core software engineering skills and DevOps, using technologies like Python and AWS.

experiences.title: Graduate Services Assistant
experiences.company: Ira A. Fulton Schools of Engineering at Arizona State University
experiences.description: Grader for CSE 536 Advanced Operating Systems course under School of Computing and Augmented Intelligence (SCAI). Responsibilities included preparing and reviewing coursework, assisting students during office hours, and grading assignments.
reference_context: Graduate Services Assistant at Ira A. Fulton Schools of Engineering
Assisted in academic activities including grading and student support for advanced operating systems course
experiences.reasoning: This role involved academic and instructional support under the higher education framework.

experiences.title: Software Development Engineer
experiences.description: Implemented OFSAA LLFP fintech solutions in SIT, UAT and provided post-implementation support in production environments for international banking firms. Engineered GUI-based workflow runs for ETL pipelines and integrated them with backend scripts for report generation. Enhanced UI module customization, improved data manipulation, and reduced execution times of scripts for customer data processing.
reference_context: Software Development Engineer at Oracle Financial Services Software
Worked on fintech solutions, ETL pipelines, UI enhancements, and data processing
experiences.reasoning: The experience required strong software development and database management skills, specifically in Oracle technologies.

experiences.title: Embedded C++ Developer
experiences.description: Designed software modules for ARM Cortex-M3 servers to measure subzero temperatures. Developed solutions to troubleshoot bugs and optimize real-time sensor data handling via RPC protocols.
reference_context: Embedded C++ Developer at Inter-university Accelerator Centre
Worked on software development for ARM Cortex-M3 based sensor devices
experiences.reasoning: The role was focused on embedded systems development and required proficiency in C++ for hardware interaction.

experiences.title: Python Developer
experiences.description: Modeled discrete mathematical Rough Set Theory concepts for Sensor Data Mining using Python. Created a custom-built library to process large datasets with high accuracy using linear regression.
reference_context: Python Developer at College of Engineering Pune
Involved in developing mathematical models and data processing libraries
experiences.reasoning: This internship required advanced Python skills, data mining techniques, and statistical modeling.
